text: @realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor Infuriates you and your base doesn’t it?  What should infuriate you is the Number of people who have died from COVID-19 because YOU didn’t act quickly enough to help slow the spread. Everything about you DerangedDemonDonald is disastrous. https://t.co/6BlzAIkBRj

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
